Reviews.Title: Good one!
Reviews.Author: Victor
Reviews.Content: Bought this one to replace my big-screen (5.5") no-name Samsung clone. Cubot GT72 turned out to be a very good phone. It has very good reception in places where my old one failed to get any. Extremely good battery life (take that with a grain of salt since my previous 5.5" phone needed to be charged every day). I tried to use GT72 only as a phone, with occasional picture/movie taking, and the battery lasted for over 10 days. I tried to push it harder after the next charge and was able to go for about 13 days and 10 hours on one battery! After that I bought Cubot (a different model, though) for my wife. Would recommend it to anybody!

ProductInfo.Features: High performance dual core MTK6572 1.2GHz processor Android 4.2 operating system to download apps Supports Wi-Fi, G-sensor, Bluetooth, and FM radio 0.3MP front camera and 2.0MP rear camera Supports an external TF card up to 16GB
ProductInfo.Name: Cubot GT72 - 4.0 Inch Android 4.2 Smartphone 1.2GHz Dual Core Dual SIM&Camera MTK6572 Bluetooth WiFi (Black,white)
